page.title: 20The investigators
page.content: The Ashey area was studied by the whole third year at Bishop Lovett Middle School,Ryde.The children who contributed to the final pages were: Pippa Allen Heather Milford Lisa Amor Claire Mitchell Kirsty Bello-Baamonde Jayne Burgess Hazel Mitchell Sarah Caws Kelly Newton Steven Field Simon Nicholls Penny Ford Charlotte Powell Donna Gilham Nicola Rayment Angela Hall Jane Riddell Vanessa Hall Debbie Rossall Marion Harmer Nicola Ruth Rebecca Harvey Tiffany Scull Ian Hill Christopher Thomas Harriet Hyde Lucy Wade David Jackman Kathryn Webber Jason Knight Scott Weston Jade Lockhart Katherine Wheeler
